name: Rohan
startIntroPart1: Hi Theoden, master of the horses !
startIntroPart2: You have awaken from your long slumber, and now the rohirrim are counting on you to lead them to a brighter tomorrow. Your neighbours won't leave you much room for peace and you may have to carve your peace with the tip of the spear. But, thanks to your leadership, Rohan might become strong enough to tip the scale in a war between Gondor and Mordor, who knows ?
attacked: I see, we will gather the Rohirrim for war.
defeated: It is over but I shall not be ashamed.
introduction: I am Theoden, King of Rohan!
uniqueText: Starts with Animal Husbandry. +1 Movement for all Mounted units, double quantity of Horses and Horses provide +1 Culture.

name: Anorien
startIntroPart1: Hi Aragorn, heir to the ancient kings !
startIntroPart2: You have come back to the ivory tower to lead your people against their many foes. The ancient evil is rising in the east, but danger may also com from the south and the haradrim or the north from the easterlings, the dwarves or even the elves. Will your allies in Rohan be ready to answer the call or will they be too occupied with Isengard ? Only you can now save and rebuild a strong and safe Gondor nation and... who knows, maybe reunite Gondor and Arnor ?
attacked: The light of the West will prevail from this agression !
defeated: It is over, will the light disappear from Middle Earth ?
introduction: I am Aragorn Elessar, heir of Isildur!
uniqueText: Workers improve tiles 25% faster, [+15]% [Food] [in capital], [+15]% [Culture] [in capital]

name: Isengard
startIntroPart1: Hi Saruman, Leader of the mighty Istari
startIntroPart2: After hundreds of years, the evil power of the east is returning and this time, good intentions won't be enough to stop it. As the leader of the Istari, sent from the West, you alone could even dream of facing him. But do you have the strengh you need or do you need to carve yourself a great empire before facing leading the offensive ? History will decide.
defeated: Save your pity and your mercy, I have no use for it!
uniqueText: 67% chance to earn 25 Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit from a conquered encampment. +25% Production towards Land units in capital
uniques: When conquering an encampment, earn [25] Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit <with [67]% chance>
